## enumType() function

Constructs a [Type](./paratype.type.md) that represents an enumeration of the specified values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function enumType<V extends string>(values: V[]): Type<V>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  values | V\[\] | Allowed values of the new enum type |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Type](./paratype.type.md)<!-- -->&lt;V&gt;
